mapper.insert: insert into shcpe_market_overview ( id, sts_date, ecds_mem_num, trx_mem_num, day_accept_num, day_accept_amount, day_discount_num, day_discount_amount, day_trade_num, day_trade_amount, year_accept_num, year_accept_amount, year_discount_num, year_discount_amount, year_trade_num, year_trade_amount ) values ( #{id}, #{sts_date}, #{ecds_mem_num}, #{trx_mem_num}, #{day_accept_num}, #{day_accept_amount}, #{day_discount_num}, #{day_discount_amount}, #{day_trade_num}, #{day_trade_amount}, #{year_accept_num}, #{year_accept_amount}, #{year_discount_num}, #{year_discount_amount}, #{year_trade_num}, #{year_trade_amount} )
